I am a front-end developer who values collaboration and knowledge sharing.
다른 동료들과 함께 지식을 나누고 함께 성장하는 것에 큰 관심을 가지고: I have a strong interest in sharing knowledge and growing together with my colleagues.
시각적 피드백과 즉각적인 결과물에서 성취감을 느껴 프론트엔드 개발을 시작: I began front-end development for the satisfaction of visual feedback and instant outcomes.
My determination to find a way and my perseverance not to give up easily are my strengths.
롤 악성 유저 신고 서비스: Report Service for Malicious Users in League of Legends
게임 내에서 욕설을 하는 악성 유저를 신고하는 커뮤니티,게임 화면을 캡처: Reporting service for toxic players who use profanity in the game, allowing users to capture and upload game screens. It integrates with Riot API to search for game users.
다국어 처리, 반응형, 유저 검색, 파일 업로드, 랭킹 조회: Multilingual support, responsive design, user search, file upload, ranking
타입스크립트와 반응형을 도전과제로 구현: Implemented TypeScript and responsiveness as challenging tasks
API 통신을 위해 instance 생성 및 API 코드를 공통으로 사용: Created instances for API communication and wrote interceptors for common use of API code, reducing code length to just 3 lines.
Due to the nature of international gaming, multilingual support is implemented using react-i18next.
부트캠프를 잘 완수한 나에게 쓰는 타임캡슐 서비스: A Time Capsule Service Written to Myself Who Successfully Completed the Bootcamp
부트캠프 시작전에 수료시점의 나에게 타임캡슐을 작성하는 서비스이며 독학하: A service that allows you to write a time capsule to yourself at the completion point before starting the bootcamp. Implemented a V2 to directly compare the differences between the code hastily written during self-study and the code with considerations for maintainability.
편지 작성, 이메일 인증, 응원글 작성, 타이머: Letter writing, email verification, message of support, timer
새로고침 시 편지 내용이 초기화되는 걸 방지 및 최초로 인증번호 발송한: Prevent letter content reset on refresh and distinguish resend requests with the same initial verification email.
header를 컴포넌트마다 넣지 않고 Layout으로 관리 - 코드의 간: Manage header via Layout for code simplicity.
자동으로 JSON 변환을 해주며, 더 편리하게 작업할 수 있는 API 디: Automatically converts to JSON and has a more user-friendly API design for convenient operations.
서울 내 외국어 가능 약국 찾기 서비스: Service for Finding Pharmacies in Seoul with Foreign Language Assistance
1999년도부터 2017년까지 외국인들의 의료시설 이용 불편의 문제가 해: A project aimed at offering foreign language support for finding pharmacies, addressing ongoing issues faced by foreigners in accessing healthcare facilities from 1999 to 2017, as indicated in a 2021 survey-based paper.
지도 API, 조건별 검색필터, 댓글기능, 마이페이지, 북마크, 랭킹 조: Map API, conditional search filters, comment functionality, My Page, bookmarks, and ranking search
약국 검색 조건 값이 초기화되어 불편하다는 의견을 해결하고자 recoil: Addressed the inconvenience of resetting pharmacy search filter values by implementing Recoil.
버튼 연속 클릭시 500에러 발생 하여 `디바운싱` 기능을 통해 북마크의: Resolved the issue of 500 errors occurring with consecutive button clicks by implementing the 'debounce' feature to limit consecutive bookmark actions.
